name: People called Jack.... Quiz | Name Game | 10 Questions

questions.text: Jack Davenport is the actor son of which British actress?
questions.explanation:
Maria Aitken.

	Jack Davenport's father is also an actor, Nigel Davenport. Jack starred in the BBC series 'This Life' and the film 'The Talented Mr Ripley'.

questions.text: Jack Jones was a leading British trade unionist for many years. Now retired, he is a national campaigner on what issue?
questions.explanation:
Pensions.

	He regularly lobbies Parliament on pensioners' rights

questions.text: Which Jack is the name given to a C19th London murderer?
questions.correct: Jack the Ripper & the Ripper & Ripper
questions.explanation:
Jack the Ripper & the Ripper & Ripper.

	There has been so much written about Jack the Ripper that people sometimes see him as a fictional or heroic figure, and forget that he murdered real women horribly.

questions.text: Which actor played the title role in the romantic comedy film, 'Jack and Sarah'?
questions.explanation:
Richard E Grant.

	Jack is a widower, and Sarah his baby daughter. It's a charming film, with Richard E Grant showing his softer, lighter side.

questions.text: Which Jack is the famous author of 'On The Road'?
Another writer Jack has the same surname as a city - which one?
questions.explanation:
London.

	Prolific journalist and author of 'White Fang'

questions.text: The Gloucestershire sportsman R C Russell was nicknamed Jack - what was his sport?
questions.explanation:
Cricket.

	Jack Russell is a popular breed of dog, hence the nickname. Gloucestershire is one of England's leading county cricket teams.

questions.text: Which Jack features in the title of a song and a film?
questions.explanation:
Jumpin' Jack Flash.

	Jumpin' Jack Flash is the title of a Rolling Stones song and a Whoopi Goldberg film

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT a Jack Nicholson film?
options: One Flew over the Cuckoo's nest
questions.explanation:
Cape Fear.

	Lots of big names in Cape Fear (1991) but Jack isn't one of them

questions.text: Can you complete the pantomime title, Jack and the ... ?
questions.explanation:
Beanstalk.

	'Jack and the Beanstalk' is a classic fairy tale and pantomime about a boy who sells the family cow for a handful of beans which grow into the magical beanstalk.
